short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IDmelon empowers you to leverage your card as a security key for easier, faster, and safer logins on computers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your information safe, as IDmelon's solution is based on FIDO technology, which is proven to be phishing-resistant and is supported and developed by technology giants including Apple, Google, and Microsoft.
Enjoy the intuitive hassle-free user experience, which allows you to log in to your accounts with a single tap of your card on a reader.
Note that you need to first have Smart Card Connector app installed on your PC. (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/smart-card-connector/khpfeaanjngmcnplbdlpegiifgpfgdco)
For more information, see our Privacy Policy.
https://idmelon.com/privacy-policy
